name: RoboTrasheer
description:
The future is here and robots will handle recycling for us in a more efficient manner or that's what we hope for, if this doesn't work out or metal and silicon hero robot will be recycled, help him not become trash and stay relevant. 
Catch a trash box with space, and send it left or right but choose wisely or time will be upon us. 

Commands >

- a  d   or  left right arrows
- Hit R to reload the game.

- E to end the game.  :V
- Space bar to catch a box

Release notes: Dammm trash...
